description: This file sets up an agent using the 'agno' library, configures it with a specific model, and executes a method to print a response to a prompt, likely related to a conversational or generative AI system.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and capabilities.

classes.name: Together
classes.description: Model class used to specify the AI model configuration.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to print the response of the agent to a given prompt, optionally streaming the output.
